reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Mercury
reconfigure.description: Update your Mercury account email or password. After saving, the integration will reload and sensors will refresh.

already_configured_update.title: Account already set up
already_configured_update.description: This Mercury account ({email}) is already in Home Assistant but may not have loaded (no sensors). Submit below to remove the old entry and add a fresh one so the integration and sensors are created.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Mercury.co.nz. Please check your credentials and try again.

abort.already_configured: This Mercury account is already set up. If you don't see sensors (e.g. sensor.mercury_nz_energy_usage), go to Settings → Devices & services, search 'Mercury', open the Mercury NZ integration, and click **Reload** (or restart Home Assistant). Use Developer Tools → States and search 'mercury' to see entity IDs.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Configuration updated. The Mercury integration may only appear under HACS in Devices & services (Settings → Devices & services → click HACS → find Mercury NZ). Your sensors should now be available: go to Developer Tools → States, search 'mercury', and use sensor.mercury_nz_energy_usage in your dashboard cards.
abort.reconfigure_reload_failed: Configuration was updated but reload failed. Restart Home Assistant (Settings → System → Restart) so the Mercury integration and sensors load.
abort.reconfigure_failed: Could not find the integration entry to reconfigure.
